gametools

Class SpriteGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • gametools.SpriteGroup

  • public class SpriteGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing and updating groups of sprites.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteGroup()
      Creates a blank sprite group.
      SpriteGroup(java.util.List<Sprite> elements)
      Creates a sprite group and fills it with the passed in sprites.
      SpriteGroup(SpriteGroup copy)
      Creates a sprite group and copies over the passed in sprites.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Sprite sprite)
      Adds a sprite to the end of the group.
      void addAll(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
      Adds all the passed in elements to the group.
      void clear()
      Empties the group of all elements.
      void drawAll()
      Runs the draw method on every sprite and removes sprites as necessary.
      Sprite get(int i)
      Returns a single sprite from the group at the specified reference.
      java.util.List<Sprite> getAll() 
      java.util.List<Sprite> getAllWithin(Area obj)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new array list.
      java.util.List<Sprite> getAllWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the object (using the specified collision method) as a new array list.
      Sprite getFirstWithin(Area obj)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the specified object.
      Sprite getFirstWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the object using the specified collision method.
      SpriteGroup getGroupWithin(Area obj)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
      SpriteGroup getGroupWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
      void remove(int i)
      Removes the specified sprite from the group.
      void remove(Sprite sprite)
      Removes the specified sprite from the group.
      void removeAll(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
      Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
      void removeAll(SpriteGroup sprites)
      Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
      void removeAllWithin(Area obj)
      Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object.
      void removeAllWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object using a custom collision testing method.
      boolean removeSprites() 
      void removeSprites(boolean remove) 
      void removeWhenOffScreen()
      Removes all sprites automatically as soon as they leave the screen.
      void setRemoveArea(Area area)
      Defines the area the sprites can move inside.

        Creates a blank sprite group.

        Creates a sprite group and copies over the passed in sprites.
        Parameters:
        copy - The sprite group to copy sprites in from.

      • SpriteGroup

        public SpriteGroup(java.util.List<Sprite> elements)
        Creates a sprite group and fills it with the passed in sprites.
        Parameters:
        elements - The sprites the group should start with.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Sprite get(int i)
        Returns a single sprite from the group at the specified reference.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the sprite.
        Returns:
        The sprite at the specified position in the group.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Sprite> getAll()
        Returns:
        An array list containing all sprites in order.

      • getFirstWithin

        public Sprite getFirstWithin(Area obj)
        Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the specified object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check collision against.
        Returns:
        The first sprite that is colliding with the specified object.

      • getFirstWithin

        public Sprite getFirstWithin(Area obj,
                             int method)
        Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the object using the specified collision method.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check collision against.
        method - The collision testing method to use.
        Returns:
        The first sprite that is colliding with the specified object.

      • getGroupWithin

        public SpriteGroup getGroupWithin(Area obj)
        Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check collision against.
        Returns:
        A sprite group containing all sprites that are touching the object.

      • getGroupWithin

        public SpriteGroup getGroupWithin(Area obj,
                                  int method)
        Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check collision against.
        method - The collision testing method to use.
        Returns:
        A sprite group containing all sprites that are touching the object.

      • getAllWithin

        public java.util.List<Sprite> getAllWithin(Area obj)
        Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new array list.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check collision against.
        Returns:
        An array list containing all sprites that are touching the object.

      • getAllWithin

        public java.util.List<Sprite> getAllWithin(Area obj,
                                           int method)
        Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the object (using the specified collision method) as a new array list.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check collision against.
        method - The collision testing method to use.
        Returns:
        An array list containing all sprites that are touching the object.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        The amount of elements contained in the group.

      • removeSprites

        public boolean removeSprites()
        Returns:
        True if the group is removing sprites outside their boundaries.

        public void add(Sprite sprite)
        Adds a sprite to the end of the group.

        sprite - The sprite to add.

      • addAll

        public void addAll(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
        Adds all the passed in elements to the group.
        Parameters:
        sprites - An array list of sprites to add to the group.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Empties the group of all elements.

      • remove

        public void remove(int i)
        Removes the specified sprite from the group.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the sprite to remove.

      • remove

        public void remove(Sprite sprite)
        Removes the specified sprite from the group.
        Parameters:
        sprite - The sprite to remove.

        Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object.
        Parameters:

      • removeAllWithin

        public void removeAllWithin(Area obj,
                            int method)
        Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object using a custom collision testing method.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check collision against.
        method - The collision testing method to use.

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll(SpriteGroup sprites)
        Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
        Parameters:
        sprites - An group of sprites to remove.

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
        Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
        Parameters:
        sprites - An array list of sprites to remove from the group.

      • removeSprites

        public void removeSprites(boolean remove)
        Parameters:
        remove - Whether or not to remove sprites from the group if they go outside their boundaries.

      • setRemoveArea

        public void setRemoveArea(Area area)
        Defines the area the sprites can move inside. If removing sprites is turned on and a sprite goes outside this area the sprite will automatically be removed.
        Parameters:
        area - The area sprites are allowed to move within.

      • removeWhenOffScreen

        public void removeWhenOffScreen()
        Removes all sprites automatically as soon as they leave the screen.

      • drawAll

        public void drawAll()
        Runs the draw method on every sprite and removes sprites as necessary.
